H0.text: Name the UK businessman who ruined his eponymous empire overnight by calling one of his products 'total crap'. Philip Green

H1.text: Name the UK businessman who ruined his eponymous empire overnight by calling one of his products 'total crap'. Stuart Rose

H2.text: Name the UK businessman who ruined his eponymous empire overnight by calling one of his products 'total crap'. Sir Philip Hampton

H3.text: Name the UK businessman who ruined his eponymous empire overnight by calling one of his products 'total crap'. Gerald Ratner

A4.text: Ratner achieved notoriety after making a speech in 1991 where he jokingly denigrated his company's products as 'total crap', leading to the company's near-collapse and his exit from the business in 1993.

A5.text: After the speech, the value of the Ratner Group plummeted by around Â£500 million, which very nearly resulted in the group's collapse.
